title: Stilettos No More
description: In this collection of essays, award-winning humorist Diana Estill shares her wacky views on the years between mini-skirts and "Mee-maw" panties, tells the truth about "shapewear," and offers advice on "how to talk so that your spouse will listen" and other mysteries. Lamenting she's "put up with this thong enough," Estill invokes her inner fashion critic as she tackles midlife with both eyes squinted.Praise for for Diana "Utterly entertaining reading." -- Midwest Book Review on Deedee Divine's Totally Skewed Guide to Life.
author: Diana Estill
